sn9.9:3.1: 9. Vajjiputtasutta
sn9.9:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ aññataro vajjiputtako bhikkhu vesāliyaṃ viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9.9:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena vesāliyaṃ vajjiputtako sabbaratticāro hoti.
sn9.9:4.3: Atha kho so bhikkhu vesāliyā tūriyatāḷitavāditanigghosasaddaṃ sutvā paridevamāno tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
sn9.9:5.2: Apaviddhaṃva vanasmiṃ dārukaṃ;
sn9.9:5.4: Ko su nāmamhehi pāpiyo”ti.
sn9.9:6.1: Atha kho yā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno anukampikā atthakāmā taṃ bhikkhuṃ saṃvejetukāmā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami;
sn9.9:8.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu tāya devatāya saṃvejito saṃvegamāpādīti.
